ygData.subject: Re: Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes this will not happen because Verant does not have a problem with twinking. If you adventure and get a item you can t use why shouldn t you be able to make
ygData.messageBody:
Yes this will not happen because Verant does not have a problem with
twinking. If you adventure and get a item you can't use why shouldn't you be
able to make a new char and use it? That's what Verant said's and I happen
to agree because what else is there for a level 50 to do?

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: RaceFace <bean@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, December 01, 1999 7:11 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith


>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>
>.
>> I wish our lambent armor was NO DROP, definitely. This isn't the
>> first time, I've said it. Won't be the last. I try to /feedback
>> my ideas, but nothing has ever come from it.
>
>I think ALL the quest armor for all the classes should be NO DROP.
>
>And I think items should have level limits on them. If they can put a
limit
>on procing, they can put a limit on being able to hold/wear an item. "You
>feel as though the magic within this item would overwhelm you." not
>necessarily all "powerful" items, but a lot of them.
>
>of course, this will never happen. :)
>
>-Gaelaian, bard of the 19th song, Tunare
>
>>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
